Andy Coulson was employed by David Cameron to improve the Conservative Party's media operation in the run-up to the May 2010 election. I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so, David Cameron said in an e-mailed statement.`` Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government.''
